chaosweaver.title: Chaosweaver
chaosweaver.description: Monster is imbued with Chaos Damage and Resistance

frostweaver.title: Frostweaver
frostweaver.description: Monster is imbued with Cold Damage and Resistance

permafrost.title: Permafrost
permafrost.description: Monster has augmented Freeze and Chill powers

deadeye.title: Deadeye
deadeye.description: Monster is Accurate and applies Marks

bombardier.title: Bombardier
bombardier.description: Monster has augmented Projectile powers and periodically unleashes a barrage of mortars

flameweaver.title: Flameweaver
flameweaver.description: Monster is imbued with Fire Damage and Resistance

arcane-buffer.title: Arcane Buffer
arcane-buffer.description: Monster has augmented Energy Shield powers and releases a stunning nova when Energy Shield breaks

stormweaver.title: Stormweaver
stormweaver.description: Monster is imbued with Lightning Damage and Resistance

bonebreaker.title: Bonebreaker
bonebreaker.description: Monster has augmented Stun powers. Monster hits are slower and can't be evaded

bloodletter.title: Bloodletter
bloodletter.description: Monster has augmented Bleed powers. Monster Maims nearby enemies
bloodletter.rewardMod: Items dropped from the Monster and its Minions are Corrupted

steel-infused.title: Steel-Infused
steel-infused.description: Monster is imbued with Physical Damage and Physical Damage Reduction

gargantuan.title: Gargantuan
gargantuan.description: Monster is massive, granting more Life, Area of Effect, and Damage

berserker.title: Berserker
berserker.description: Monster Enrages as it loses life

sentinel.title: Sentinel
sentinel.description: Monster is imbued with Block and Spell Block. Monster Triggers Reckoning when hit

juggernaut.title: Juggernaut
juggernaut.description: Monster cannot be Slowed or Stunned. Monster gains Endurance Charges

vampiric.title: Vampiric
vampiric.description: Monster has augmented Life Leech powers

overcharged.title: Overcharged
overcharged.description: Monster grants Charges to itself and Allies over time

malediction.title: Malediction
malediction.description: Monster periodically creates Consecrated Ground, healing allies and making them immune to curses and ailments

frenzied.title: Frenzied
frenzied.description: Monster's minions summon invulnerable Lightning Totems on death

heralding-minions.title: Heralding Minions
heralding-minions.description: Monster's minions are empowered. Minions empower the Monster with additional modifiers on death

empowering-minions.title: Empowering Minions
empowering-minions.description: Monster has augmented Critical powers and has Shroud Walker

assassin.title: Assassin
assassin.description: Monster has damage avoidance. Monster periodically Flees

trickster.title: Trickster
trickster.description: Monster can raise Undead. Minions are empowered and revive shortly after dying

necromancer.title: Necromancer
necromancer.description: Monster has Life Regeneration. Periodically releases a wave that heals nearby allies and prevents enemy Life and Energy Shield recovery
necromancer.rewardMod: Rewards are rolled 2 additional times, choosing the rarest result

rejuvenating.title: Rejuvenating
rejuvenating.description: Monster gains Damage based on missing enemy Life. Monster has an aura that prevents enemies recovering Life and Energy Shield above 50%
rejuvenating.rewardMod: Rewards are rolled 1 additional time, choosing the rarest result

executioner.title: Executioner
executioner.description: Monster is Hexproof. Monster is followed by a Hexing Effigy that creates Hexing areas

hexer.title: Hexer
hexer.description: Monster disables Flask effects on hit. Monster has an aura that drains Flask charges and prevents gaining Flask charges

drought-bringer.title: Drought Bringer
drought-bringer.description: Monster creates Thorned Vines that slow and deal Chaos Damage over time.

entangler.title: Entangler
entangler.description: Monster is protected by a Temporal Bubble that severely slows those in it and cannot be damaged by those outside of it

temporal-bubble.title: Temporal Bubble
temporal-bubble.description: Monster's minions are replaced with powerful Treants. Some Damage taken from the monster is split between the Treants

treant-hoard.title: Treant Hoard
treant-hoard.description: Monster's Minions drop a randomly-chosen Reward Type
treant-hoard.rewardMod: Monster's Minions drop a randomly-chosen Reward Type

frost-strider.title: Frost Strider
frost-strider.description: Monster leaves Chilling Ground in its wake. Minions create Frost Bearers on death

ice-prison.title: Ice Prison
ice-prison.description: Monster periodically entraps players in a cage of ice
ice-prison.rewardMod: Rewards are rolled 1 additional time, choosing the rarest result

soul-eater.title: Soul Eater
soul-eater.description: Monster empowers when nearby allies die. Periodically summons Phantasms

flame-strider.title: Flame Strider
flame-strider.description: Monster leaves Burning Ground in its wake. Minions create Flame Bearers on death

corpse-detonator.title: Corpse Detonator
corpse-detonator.description: Monster detonates nearby Corpses. Monster periodically creates Corpses

evocationist.title: Evocationist
evocationist.description: Monster is imbued with Elemental Damage, Resistances and Ailments

magma-barrier.title: Magma Barrier
magma-barrier.description: Monster is protected by a Magmatic shield that explodes when depleted. Monster periodically creates Volatile Flamebloods
magma-barrier.rewardMod: Rewards are rolled 1 additional time, choosing the rarest result

mirror-image.title: Mirror Image
mirror-image.description: Monster can create illusions of itself
mirror-image.rewardMod: Rewards are rolled 2 additional times, choosing the rarest result

storm-strider.title: Storm Strider
storm-strider.description: Monster leaves Shocking Ground in its wake and spawns Lightning Mirages when hit. Minions create Storm Bearers on death

mana-siphoner.title: Mana Siphoner
mana-siphoner.description: Monster is surrounded by a ring that deals Lightning Damage over time as well as draining Mana
mana-siphoner.rewardMod: Rewards are rolled 1 additional time, choosing the rarest result

corrupter.title: Corrupter
corrupter.description: Monster inflicts Corrupted Blood on Hit and when Hit. Minions create Corrupted Bubbles on death
corrupter.rewardMod: Items dropped from the Monster and its Minions are Corrupted

invulnerable.title: Invulnerable
invulnerable.description: Monster and its Minions periodically become immune to all Damage. Minions cannot die while Monster is alive

crystal-skinned.title: Crystal-Skinned
crystal-skinned.description: Monster triggers the creation of Crystals when hit. Crystals explode when the Monster dies

empowered-elements.title: Empowered Elements
empowered-elements.description: Monster cycles between imbued damage of a particular type and immunity to all other damage types
empowered-elements.rewardMod: Rewards are rolled 1 additional time, choosing the rarest result

effigy.title: Effigy
effigy.description: Monster creates an Effigy of the player. Damage dealt to the Effigy is also reflected to the bonded player
effigy.rewardMod: Rewards are rolled 1 additional time, choosing the rarest result

lunaris-touched.title: Lunaris-Touched
lunaris-touched.description: Monster uses the abilities of Lunaris
lunaris-touched.rewardMod: All Reward Types have an additional reward

solaris-touched.title: Solaris-Touched
solaris-touched.description: Monster uses the abilities of Solaris
solaris-touched.rewardMod: All Reward Types have an additional reward

arakaali-touched.title: Arakaali-Touched
arakaali-touched.description: Monster uses the abilities of Arakaali
arakaali-touched.rewardMod: All Reward Types are Divination Cards

brine-king-touched.title: Brine King-Touched
brine-king-touched.description: Monster uses the abilities of the Brine King
brine-king-touched.rewardMod: Rewards are rolled 6 additional times, choosing the rarest result

tukohama-touched.title: Tukohama-Touched
tukohama-touched.description: Monster uses the abilities of Tukohama
tukohama-touched.rewardMod: Rewards are rolled 4 additional times, choosing the rarest result

abberath-touched.title: Abberath-Touched
abberath-touched.description: Monster uses the abilities of Abberath
abberath-touched.rewardMod: Rewards are rolled 4 additional times, choosing the rarest result

shakari-touched.title: Shakari-Touched
shakari-touched.description: Monster uses the abilities of Shakari

innocence-touched.title: Innocence-Touched
innocence-touched.description: Monster uses the abilities of Innocence

kitava-touched.title: Kitava-Touched
kitava-touched.description: Monster uses the abilities of Kitava

challenge-4.title: Defeat Archnemesis III - 4
challenge-4.rewardMod: Bloodletter, Frost Strider, Ice Prison, Sentinel

challenge-5.title: Defeat Archnemesis III - 5
challenge-5.rewardMod: Brine King-touched, Flame Strider, Magma Barrier, Shakari-touched

challenge-6.title: Defeat Archnemesis III - 6
challenge-6.rewardMod: Executioner, Mirror Image, Soul Eater, Treant Hoard
